name: LazyPub
tag_list: ios, newsstand, iphone, ipad, digital-publishing, magazines, ebooks, pdf
description: iOS publishing so easy it makes you lazy
overview:
Easy publishing of PDF and HTML publications on mobile devices and tablets.

iOS universal newsstand app with publications list, In-App purchase/subscriptions, advanced reader with bookmarks, interactivity support, PUSH notifications, social sharing, layout view. Interactivity can be added to simple PDF files: video (YouTube, Vimeo, Daily Motion), sound (.mp3 file) or link to a website.

Backend that interacts with the app and allows for issue management, provides analytics and includes payment system. Analytics include number of downloads per issue, how many times did every user opened a issue, how many minutes did a user spent reading your publication, which was the most viewed page or the most interesting article

B2B model based on recurring monthly subscriptions. Three subscription methods depending on the type and frequency of publication.
